- [93mQuantifying[0m the [93mpotential[0m [93mgains[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m from [93meliminating[0m [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m, [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93minjuries[0m, and [93mcancers[0m in [93mIran[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mLife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m ([93mLE[0m) [93mserves[0m as a [93mcritical[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mmetric[0m for [93massessing[0m [91mchanges[0m in [93mrisk[0m [93mfactors[0m, [93mhealth[0m [93moutcomes[0m, and the [93meffectiveness[0m of [93mmedical[0m [93mtreatments[0m. The [93mdata[0m [93manalysis[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93musing[0m [93mR[0m [92msoftware[0m [93mversion[0m [93m4[0m.[93m2[0m.[93m1[0m. [93mResults[0m: In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mCVD[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m5[0m.[93m74[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m10[0m.[93m62[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m in [93m2010[0m. In that [93mcalendar[0m [93myear[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mdeaths[0m from [93mRTIs[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m0[0m.[93m59[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m24[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mSimilarly[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mcancer[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m1[0m.[93m31[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m24[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. In [93m2020[0m, [93mexcluding[0m [93mCVD[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m4[0m.[93m99[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m9[0m.[93m66[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mExcluding[0m [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93minjuries[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m0[0m.[93m46[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m0[0m.[93m17[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mExcluding[0m [93mcancer[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m by [93m1[0m.[93m48[0m [93myears[0m for [93mmen[0m and [93m1[0m.[93m39[0m [93myears[0m for [93mwomen[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mOur[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mfound[0m that at the [93mnational[0m [93mlevel[0m, [93meliminating[0m [93mcardiovascular[0m [93mdisease[0m and then [93mcancer[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mgreatest[0m [93mgain[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m at [93mbirth[0m and at [93mother[0m [93mages[0m. [93mCompared[0m with the [93mother[0m [93mtwo[0m [93moutcomes[0m, the [93melimination[0m of [93mroad[0m [93mtraffic[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mhad[0m the [93msmallest[0m [93mincrease[0m in [93mlife[0m [93mexpectancy[0m.
- [93mAccurate[0m [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mvia[0m [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillators[0m.: [93mAccurately[0m [92mmodeling[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mvan[0m [93mder[0m [93mWaals[0m ([93mvdW[0m) [93minteractions[0m in [93matomistic[0m [92msystems[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mrequires[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93mquantum[0m-[93mmechanical[0m [93mmethods[0m that are [93mcomputationally[0m [93mexpensive[0m, [93mhence[0m [93mlimited[0m in [93mapplicability[0m. To [93maddress[0m this [93mchallenge[0m, [93mefficient[0m [93myet[0m [93mphysically[0m [93mgrounded[0m [92mmodels[0m are [93mneeded[0m-[93mones[0m that not only [93menable[0m [93maccurate[0m [93mpredictions[0m but [93malso[0m [93mprovide[0m [93minsight[0m into how [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m [93mscale[0m in [93mcomplex[0m [93mmolecular[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. This [93mreview[0m [93mhighlights[0m the [93mquantum[0m [93mDrude[0m [93moscillator[0m ([93mQDO[0m) [92mmodel[0m, a [93mphysically[0m [93mmotivated[0m and [93mcomputationally[0m [93mefficient[0m [92mframework[0m that [93mcaptures[0m the [93messential[0m [93mfeatures[0m of [93melectronic[0m [93mresponse[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mpolarization[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93mforces[0m, [93macross[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mrange[0m of [93mchemical[0m and [93mmaterial[0m [92msystems[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdiscuss[0m how the [93mQDO[0m [92mmodel[0m [93mquantitatively[0m [93mreproduces[0m the [93mpolarization[0m [93mresponse[0m of [93mmany[0m-[93melectron[0m [93matoms[0m and how [93mkey[0m [93mcomponents[0m of [93mnoncovalent[0m [93minteractions[0m-[93mexchange[0m-[93mrepulsion[0m, [93mpolarization[0m, and [93mdispersion[0m-[93memerge[0m [93mnaturally[0m in [93mQDO[0m [93mdimers[0m. [93mFurthermore[0m, the [92mmodel[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mpredictive[0m [93mscaling[0m [93mlaws[0m that [93melucidate[0m [93mtrends[0m in [93mpolarizability[0m and [93mdispersion[0m [93macross[0m the [93mperiodic[0m [93mtable[0m and in [93mmolecular[0m [93massemblies[0m. and [93mpercentages[0m, with [93mtreatments[0m over [93m0[0m.[93m5[0m% of the [93mtotal[0m [93mclassified[0m as [93mcommon[0m. [93mStatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m [93mincluded[0m [93munderscoring[0m the [93mnecessity[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mtargeted[0m [93minvestigations[0m.
- A [93mfive[0m-[93mdecade[0m [93mreview[0m of [93macademic[0m [93mresearch[0m on [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m: a [93mbibliometric[0m [93mapproach[0m [93musing[0m [93mco[0m-[93mword[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mbibliographic[0m [93mcoupling[0m.: [93mPurpose[0m: This [93mpaper[0m [93manalysed[0m the [93mimpact[0m and [93mevolution[0m of [93mscientific[0m [93mresearch[0m on the [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m ([93mHCS[0m) from a [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mperspective[0m, [93mcovering[0m the [93mperiod[0m [93m1971[0m-[93m2024[0m. The [93mstudy[0m [93mused[0m [93mdata[0m from the [93mWeb[0m of [93mScience[0m and [93mScopus[0m [93mdatabases[0m to [93midentify[0m [93memerging[0m and [93mestablished[0m [93mareas[0m of [93mstudy[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mHCS[0m. [92mDesign[0m/[93mmethodology[0m/[93mapproach[0m: A [93mbibliometric[0m [93mstudy[0m was [93mconducted[0m [93musing[0m a [93mdataset[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m. The [93manalysis[0m [93mfocused[0m on [93mkeyword[0m [93mco[0m-[93moccurrences[0m to [93mexamine[0m the [93mevolution[0m of [93mHCS[0m [93mresearch[0m. The [93mrepresentation[0m of [93mkeywords[0m is [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m, [93mdiagrams[0m and [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mmaps[0m to [93mhighlight[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mtopics[0m in the [93mfield[0m. [93mFindings[0m: This [93mstudy[0m [93mprovides[0m [93minsights[0m into the [93mevolution[0m of [93mHCS[0m [93mresearch[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93memerging[0m and [93mestablished[0m [93mareas[0m of [93mstudy[0m. The [93manalysis[0m of [93m3[0m,[93m602[0m [93mpublications[0m [93mallowed[0m the [93midentification[0m of [93mkey[0m [93mthemes[0m and [93mtrends[0m in the [93mfield[0m and [93moffers[0m a [93mcomprehensive[0m [93mview[0m of the [93mstate[0m of the [93mart[0m. The [93mresults[0m are [93mpresented[0m through [93mtables[0m, [93mdiagrams[0m and [93mlongitudinal[0m [93mmaps[0m, [93mthus[0m [93mfacilitating[0m a [93mclearer[0m [93munderstanding[0m of the [93mresearch[0m [93mlandscape[0m. [93mPractical[0m [93mimplications[0m: The [93mfindings[0m [93mhave[0m [93mpractical[0m [93mimplications[0m for [93mresearchers[0m and [93mscholars[0m in the [93mHSC[0m [93mdomain[0m. The [93midentified[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mareas[0m and [93mtrends[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93mguidance[0m for [93mfuture[0m [93mresearch[0m in the [93mfield[0m. [93mResearchers[0m [93mcan[0m [93muse[0m this [93minformation[0m to [93mnavigate[0m the [93mcurrent[0m [93mstate[0m of the [93mfield[0m and [93mmake[0m [93minformed[0m [93mdecisions[0m about the [93mdirection[0m of [93mtheir[0m [93mresearch[0m. [93mOriginality[0m/[93mvalue[0m: This [93mstudy[0m [93mcontributes[0m to the [93munderstanding[0m of the [93mevolution[0m of [93mscientific[0m [93mresearch[0m on [93mhealthcare[0m [93msupply[0m [93mchain[0m from [93m1971[0m to [93m2024[0m. By [93memploying[0m [93mbibliometric[0m [93manalysis[0m and [93mvisual[0m [93mrepresentations[0m, a [93munique[0m [93mperspective[0m on the [93mHCS[0m [93mlandscape[0m is [93mpresented[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mprovide[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93minsights[0m for [93mresearchers[0m and [93mscholars[0m, [93moffering[0m a [93mfoundation[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93minvestigations[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mHSC[0m [93mresearch[0m.
- [93mTrend[0m of [93mmalaria[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m among [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m, [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m, [93mGhana[0m, [93m2018[0m-[93m2022[0m.: [93mBackground[0m: [93mMalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m ([93mMiP[0m) [93mremains[0m a [93mserious[0m [93mpublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mproblem[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93madverse[0m [93meffects[0m on [93mmaternal[0m [93mhealth[0m, [93mpregnancy[0m [93moutcomes[0m, and the [93mcost[0m of [93mhealthcare[0m [93mdelivery[0m. [93mSignificant[0m [93msuccesses[0m [93mhave[0m been [93machieved[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mglobally[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mlittle[0m is [93mknown[0m about the [93mprogress[0m [93mmade[0m in [93mcontrolling[0m [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdescribed[0m the [93mtrend[0m of the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m of [93mGhana[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mMethods[0m: The [93mstudy[0m [93memployed[0m a [93mretrospective[0m, [93mdescriptive[0m, [93mcross[0m-[93msectional[0m [93mstudy[0m [93musing[0m [93mdata[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m. [93mData[0m on [93mmalaria[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m was [93mextracted[0m from the [93mDHIMS[0m [93m2[0m [93mdatabase[0m and [93mtransferred[0m into [93mMicrosoft[0m [93mExcel[0m [93mversion[0m [93m19[0m. [93mDescriptive[0m [93mstatistical[0m [93manalyses[0m were [93mdone[0m. [93mResults[0m were [93msummarised[0m into [93mfrequencies[0m and [93mpercentages[0m and [93mpresented[0m in [93mtables[0m, [93mgraphs[0m, and [93mmaps[0m. [93mResults[0m: [93mOverall[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtesting[0m [93mrate[0m was [93m90[0m.[93m8[0m% ([93m46[0m,[93m734[0m/[93m51[0m,[93m479[0m) and [93m54[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m54[0m.[93m0[0m-[93m55[0m.[93m0[0m) of [93mpregnant[0m [93mwomen[0m [93mtested[0m [93mpositive[0m. The [93mmajority[0m, [93m68[0m.[93m0[0m%, of [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m in the [93mregion[0m were [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m [93m20[0m-[93m34[0m [93myears[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m was [93mhighest[0m among [93mmothers[0m [93maged[0m below [93m20[0m [93myears[0m, [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m58[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m60[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m [93mhad[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m, [93m70[0m.[93m1[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m69[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m70[0m.[93m8[0m) and [93maccounted[0m for [93m40[0m.[93m5[0m% ([93m10[0m,[93m315[0m/[93m25[0m,[93m463[0m) of [93mall[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mcases[0m. [93mThere[0m was a [93mdecline[0m in the [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m from [93m2018[0m to [93m2022[0m from [93m60[0m.[93m4[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m59[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m61[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m51[0m.[93m6[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m50[0m.[93m7[0m-[93m52[0m.[93m6[0m). [93mConclusion[0m: The [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mSavannah[0m [93mRegion[0m is [93mhigh[0m, with [93mdisparities[0m among [93mDistricts[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mthere[0m is an [93mapparent[0m [93mdecline[0m over the [93mstudy[0m [93mperiod[0m. [93mThere[0m is a [93mneed[0m to [93mstrengthen[0m [93mexisting[0m [93mmalaria[0m [93mprevention[0m [93minterventions[0m in [93mpregnancy[0m, [93msuch[0m as the [93muse[0m of [93mSP[0m for [93mIPTp[0m and [93mITNs[0m to [93mprevent[0m [93mnegative[0m [93mmaternal[0m and [93mfetal[0m [93mbirth[0m [93moutcomes[0m. [93mPublic[0m [93mhealth[0m [93meducation[0m [93mprogrammes[0m [93mcould[0m [93mimprove[0m the [93muptake[0m and [93mutilisation[0m of [93mITNs[0m. [93mFurther[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mconducted[0m to [93munravel[0m the [93mreasons[0m for the [93mdisproportionately[0m [93mhigh[0m [93mMiP[0m [93mtest[0m [93mpositivity[0m [93mrate[0m in the [93mBole[0m [93mDistrict[0m to [93menable[0m the [93mimplementation[0m of [93mpreventive[0m [93mmeasures[0m.
- [93mPremature[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mmalignancies[0m of the [93mcentral[0m [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m in [93mJapan[0m: a [93mnationwide[0m [93mdescriptive[0m [93manalysis[0m from [93m2000[0m to [93m2020[0m.: [93mPurpose[0m: [93mWe[0m [93mapplied[0m the [93maverage[0m [93mlifespan[0m [93mshortened[0m ([93mALSS[0m) [93mmeasure[0m to [93mexamine[0m [93mlifespan[0m'[93ms[0m [91mchanges[0m among [93mindividuals[0m who [93mdied[0m from [93mmalignancies[0m of the [93mcentral[0m [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m ([93mCNS[0m) in [93mJapan[0m from [93m2000[0m to [93m2020[0m. [93mMethods[0m: [93mMortality[0m [93mdata[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m were [93mobtained[0m from the [93mWorld[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mOrganization[0m [93mMortality[0m [93mDatabase[0m. [93mYears[0m of [93mlife[0m [93mlost[0m ([93mYLL[0m) were [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m [93mJapanese[0m [93mlife[0m [93mtables[0m. [93mALSS[0m was [93mcalculated[0m as the [93mratio[0m between [93mYLL[0m and the [93mexpected[0m [93mlifespan[0m, and its [93m95[0m% [93mconfidence[0m [93minterval[0m ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m) was [93mcalculated[0m [93musing[0m the [93mbootstrap[0m [93mmethod[0m. [93mResults[0m: Over the [93mstudy[0m, the [93mage[0m-[93mstandardized[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mrates[0m [93madjusted[0m to the [93mWorld[0m [93mStandard[0m [93mPopulation[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m [93mincreased[0m from [93m1[0m.[93m0[0m to [93m1[0m.[93m3[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mmen[0m and from [93m0[0m.[93m7[0m to [93m0[0m.[93m9[0m [93mdeaths[0m [93mper[0m [93m100[0m,[93m000[0m [93mwomen[0m. [93mALSS[0m [93mresults[0m [93mindicated[0m that [93mmen[0m with [93mCNS[0m [93mmalignancies[0m [93mlost[0m [93m30[0m.[93m7[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m29[0m.[93m2[0m-[93m32[0m.[93m2[0m) of [93mtheir[0m [93mlifespan[0m in [93m2000[0m, and [93m24[0m.[93m3[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m23[0m.[93m4[0m-[93m25[0m.[93m3[0m) in [93m2020[0m. [93mSimilarly[0m, [93mALSS[0m [93mvalues[0m for [93mwomen[0m [93mdecreased[0m from [93m32[0m.[93m9[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m31[0m.[93m3[0m-[93m34[0m.[93m5[0m) to [93m25[0m.[93m2[0m% ([93m95[0m% [93mCI[0m: [93m24[0m.[93m1[0m-[93m26[0m.[93m3[0m) over the [93msame[0m [93mperiod[0m. [93mConclusion[0m: [93mOur[0m [93mstudy[0m [93mrevealed[0m a [93mgain[0m in [93mlifespan[0m of [93mindividuals[0m with [93mCNS[0m [93mcancers[0m in [93mboth[0m [93msexes[0m in [93mJapan[0m over the [93m20[0m-[93myear[0m [93mperiod[0m.
